message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $15000. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as the product's value exceeds the asking price by $1000. I am confident that you will find this offer irresistible and beneficial. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you would like to proceed with the purchase.
